title: Smart Cable, Satellite, TV, Blu-Ray, AVR Remote
summary: MyAV is an unofficial TiVo & universal remote control app. Free 7 Day TRIAL
description: Unofficial MyAV TiVo®  Control App allows you to control your network-connected TiVo® Box from the comfort of your seat using your Android device. It also works with DirecTV, Dish TV, Sky+HD(UK), Dreambox satellite and Xfinity X1 cable (manually add via settings) receivers.Not only this but MyAV can also control a range of other products,  Other devices include Blu-ray players, AV Receivers, Lighting. Makes include Sony, Panasonic, Onkyo, Denon, Pioneer, LG, Philips, Yamaha, Samsung. MyAV TiVo®  Control offers virtually the same functionality as your TiVo® remote, but with the added benefits of a bold, simple, intuitive design and direct access to channels*. It has been designed for all ages and for ease of use, with large channel icons, which mean it is easier than ever to choose whatever channel you want. Your  TiVo® box must be connected to your router/hub via Ethernet for this app to work. You will also need to enable “network remote” in the TiVo® settings menu (You may have to disable and the re-enable this setting). For best results, specify a fixed IP on your TiVo® box before installing this app. The VM TiVo box can only accept one connection at a time, so only run this app on one Android device at a time.For the optimum experience, please use this app on a tablet. It will work on a phone but the buttons are small as a result.Features include:-Easy connect to your TiVo box, no manual IP entry needed!-Bold interface with bright icons that make browsing channels* a breeze-Delete unwanted channels* quickly and easily-Channel filters to easily find the desired channel*-Hold down, then drag and drop your favourite channels* into a favourites folder.-Use your Android keyboard to search the guide and YouTube more easily.-TV & Blu-Ray control, most smart devices are detected automatically-IR database for phones/tablets with IR blasters* selected countries only, more countries coming soon.This is a free 7 day trial version
descriptionHTML:
Unofficial MyAV TiVo® Control App allows you to control your network-connected TiVo® Box from the comfort of your seat using your Android device. It also works with DirecTV, Dish TV, Sky+HD(UK), Dreambox satellite and Xfinity X1 cable (manually add via settings) receivers.

Not only this but MyAV can also control a range of other products, Other devices include Blu-ray players, AV Receivers, Lighting. Makes include Sony, Panasonic, Onkyo, Denon, Pioneer, LG, Philips, Yamaha, Samsung.
MyAV TiVo® Control offers virtually the same functionality as your TiVo® remote, but with the added benefits of a bold, simple, intuitive design and direct access to channels*. It has been designed for all ages and for ease of use, with large channel icons, which mean it is easier than ever to choose whatever channel you want.
Your TiVo® box must be connected to your router/hub via Ethernet for this app to work. You will also need to enable “network remote” in the TiVo® settings menu (You may have to disable and the re-enable this setting). For best results, specify a fixed IP on your TiVo® box before installing this app. The VM TiVo box can only accept one connection at a time, so only run this app on one Android device at a time.
For the optimum experience, please use this app on a tablet. It will work on a phone but the buttons are small as a result.

Features include:
-Easy connect to your TiVo box, no manual IP entry needed!
-Bold interface with bright icons that make browsing channels* a breeze
-Delete unwanted channels* quickly and easily
-Channel filters to easily find the desired channel*
-Hold down, then drag and drop your favourite channels* into a favourites folder.
-Use your Android keyboard to search the guide and YouTube more easily.
-TV & Blu-Ray control, most smart devices are detected automatically
-IR database for phones/tablets with IR blasters

* selected countries only, more countries coming soon.

This is a free 7 day trial version
comments: Exactly the same app as their others??  Seems like Pocketwood are just rebadging the one crappy app over and over again?
Did not know it's a trial. Wants me to pay for the app even though it is for 1 device.    Wish I knew about the version. Where dose it say you have have to  pay! !!!!!!!!!!!!!  What a crock.
Bad Payed for it.got screwed nobody gets back with you .tried for three days.$9.00 down the drain.still waiting !!!! Left two email adresses an sent many emails
TWC BOX REMOTE I LOOOOVE this app. My kids always lose the remotes. Now all my electronics have remotes via the playstore:) super happy
recentChanges: Support for Sky Pro & Sky HD (Cable) Germany
